resources.string: Where You can find all information?
Evrything else you can find in Meniu section
In this section you can find some information about me
In this section you can find some information my experience
I thing you still have questions for me, so you can contact me one of methods below:
Experiance: about 7 months. Made apps: more than 10 (fully completed)

I use Android Studio about 7 months now. Maded some apps witch I can show in interview. Android Studiois is strongest my side. And I like it very much. I know what is layouts, adapters, holders, values files and many more. By theway this app was maded with it. 
 	* Know how to use grandle 
 	* Know why I need manifest 
 	* Know about difirent screens compability 
 	* Now have interested learn use MVVM pattern 
 	* Thinking switch to Kotlin one day (Now still using Java)
Experience: about 2 months. Everything still pretty new to me.

I am very new at this JavaScript framework, but excided to learn it and know basic structure of project. \\n \\t * Very slow, but usaly can get things done \\n \\t * Know how to use NPM \\n \\t * Like to learn it
Experience about 1 year. Made 5 applications (not published, but can show in interview)

"Have some knowledge becouse C# was first my Object Oriented programing langue. I enjoy using Visual Studio and this language, becouse it is preaty and simple to me \\n \\t * Have real work experiance with it \\n \\t * Know about: \\n \\t .NET \\n \\t ASP.NET \\n \\t MVC patter "
Experience: about 9 months. Made games: 4 (one fully accessible in Google Play Store)

I using Unity not alot, but having fun when I do games with it. I know how animations works, whath is coliders, can write scripts and basicly make things work. \\n \\t * Done one app with full Google Games Service \\n \\t * Played with Vuforia plugin and made fun VR shooter game \\n \\t * Like alot developers love create new games

Not using alot, becouse usaly I work alone, but realy want to know and learn about it doing things \\n\\t* Know how to push or clone projects \\n\\t* Stuff about merge conflicts not so big problem to me \\n\\t* I think you can help me with biger projects....
What I am DOING right now?
I am currently studying VIKO EIF Smart Equipment Technologies. In my free time (and not only) learning to develop Android applications.

I always have goals that make me move along. It\'s not terrible to me try out new and unknown things. Not only I think about things, but I try to get them done. Strongest developing side - create Android applications using Android Studio IDE.

I am a little slow. I think this is just a matter of time and experience. I have theoretical knowledge about MVVM, MVC and similar templates, but still difficult to implement them. The weakest part of the creation is React Native.

Programing and developing aplications is my hobby, so work where I can do those thing is be a great and meaningful, time-consuming, resourceful and up-to-date resource. I hope to be beneficial and to benefit from what is beneficial to everyone. Therefore, my main goal at the moment is meaningful work, perhaps at your company.
I think I have enough potential to be useful. If you invest in me, I can promise to be the best for you, stay and grow with you.
I hope you understand that I\'m not yet a senior programmer, you always can help when you really need it, and let it go ahead with you.
I practice at the IoT Teltonika Academy. Runtime - 270 hours. I have proof of this (certificate).
While studying I had two internships. Language learning was C #. I also have other theoretical materials about programming (design) templates, program memory, object oriented programing and so on.
I Have some experience with Google Play Console, App publiching, Updates.
Have some experience with Google Play Games services, one game fully available in Google Play Store.
